post.body: LMAO...."Chai-na. Maybe Tea-bet." Very funny shirt!
...oops, didn't see your posting about already having a chill pad from Target. And I apologize for even mentioning WalMart.LOL
Walmart carries a chill pad for just under $30. It works great.
Actually I have two guitars and can't hardly play a chord on either. Nee to just sit down and learn...or find someone to teach
I would learn to play guitar. I know it's not rocket science but it is something I want to be able to do.
...just kidding
that's just because Mahatma Gandhi was never given a Harley.
Wow, I haven't seen one of those since I left Hawaii back in the early 80's. Too cute!!!
...thank you.
song from Ferris Beuller's Day of was "Oh Yeah" by Yello.
"The Future's So Bright, I Gotta Wear Shades" by Timbuk3
Well, starting my first day back to work since 19 Dec. Plus finally back on 5 day work weeks...WOOHOO!!!!!!!!
HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!!!! Hopefully we all will be fine in 2009!
http://www.kake.com/home/headlines/36786684.html ...nice feature about funeral yesterday.
And yes, the inbreds from Westborough Baptist church made an appearance but were kept down the road a ways.
My fingers are just thawing out from the ride.
Today we had the funeral of one of the founding fathers of the Kansas Patriot Guard, Greg "Ebay" Hansen. Cold ride in more ways than one.
wants to wish everyone a very Merry Christmas, Happy Hanukka, Happy Kwanzaa, Mele Kalikimaka, Happy Yule, Miri Kirihimete....aroha, aloha
MERRY CHRISTMAS EVERYBODY!!!!!!!!!!
WooHoo!!!! Almost Christmas!!..Put the car in the shop today and found it will only cost me $216 to fix!!!! There is a Santa Claus!!!!!!!!
